participant_1.background:
I have twelve kids.
I live in alabama.
I am obese.
I have blonde hair.

participant_2.background:
I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
As a child , i won a national spelling bee.
I have perfect pitch.
I have been published in the new yorker magazine.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play music.

Cool, me too! I love to read books, especially historical fiction and mysteries. I also love to write, and I've been published in a few magazines. I don't play any musical instruments, but I love listening to music.

That's so cool! I've always wanted to be published, but I've never had the courage to submit anything to a magazine. I'm not very good at playing instruments either, but I love listening to music. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to all kinds of music, but my favorites are probably classic rock, country, and folk. I also love listening to Broadway musicals.
Oh, I love Broadway musicals too! I've seen a few of them on stage, and I always love the music and the stories. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What are some of your favorite Broadway musicals?
My favorite Broadway musicals are probably Wicked, The Phantom of the Opera, and Les Misérables. They're all so good!
I love those musicals too! I've seen them all on stage, and they're always amazing. What do you think of Hamilton?
I've heard good things about it, but I haven't seen it yet. I'm definitely looking forward to seeing it one day.
You should! It's a great show.
I'll have to check it out.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to travel, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.

Cool, me too! I love to travel, and I've been to a lot of different countries. I also love going to the movies, and I'm always up for a good movie night. I love spending time with my family too, and we do a lot of fun things together.
